heroIntro: Imagine waking up to Mediterranean sunshine, stepping into your own private retreat in one of Spain's most coveted coastal regions. This exceptional 3-bedroom bungalow in San Javier represents the perfect holiday home investment—a sanctuary where you can escape the ordinary and embrace the Spanish lifestyle you've always dreamed of. At €258,900, you're acquiring a premium-specification property at a remarkable value, priced 40% below comparable Spanish island markets. San Javier sits on the stunning Costa Blanca, where azure waters meet golden beaches and year-round sunshine creates an enviable climate for relaxation and adventure. Whether you're seeking a weekend retreat, a summer sanctuary, or a year-round Mediterranean base, this bungalow offers authentic Spanish living without the premium price tag. The thoughtfully designed 87m² interior maximizes comfort and functionality, while the pueblo location connects you to local culture, authentic restaurants, and vibrant community life. This is more than a property purchase—it's an investment in lifestyle, wellness, and countless memories of golden-hour beach walks, lazy afternoons by the Mediterranean, and nights filled with the sounds of Spanish village life.
areaSection: San Javier is a charming pueblo municipality in the heart of Murcia's Costa Blanca, positioned perfectly between the bustling coastal resorts and the peaceful interior countryside. This strategic location grants residents the best of both worlds: direct access to multiple Blue Flag beaches within 20 minutes, yet authentic Spanish village character with local markets, traditional architecture, and genuine community connections. The region benefits from over 300 days of annual sunshine, creating consistently warm, Mediterranean weather ideal for outdoor living. San Javier has experienced steady growth as savvy property buyers recognize its value proposition—offering authentic Spanish living, excellent amenities, and accessibility to both natural attractions and international conveniences. The area's infrastructure has modernized significantly, with improved road connections, expanded healthcare facilities, and enhanced international school options, all while maintaining its charming pueblo essence. This balance of development and tradition makes San Javier increasingly attractive for those seeking substance over superficial resort living.
lifestyleSection: Daily life in San Javier unfolds at a refreshingly human pace, where neighbors gather in local plazas, family-run restaurants serve authentic paella, and the beach is never more than a short drive away. You'll experience authentic Spanish village culture—the morning paseo through town, weekend market days filled with fresh local produce, and genuine connections with an established international community where English is widely spoken. The expat population here is mature and well-integrated, creating a welcoming environment for newcomers while maintaining local character. Evenings might involve aperitivos at a neighborhood bar, exploring the nearby championship golf courses, or simply watching the sunset from a local vantage point. Healthcare is remarkably accessible, with English-speaking doctors and modern private clinics complementing regional hospital services—crucial peace of mind for holiday home owners. Shopping is convenient with major supermarkets like Mercadona and Lidl, plus weekly local markets offering seasonal produce. The lifestyle here is fundamentally about quality time: more beach days, fewer office commutes, better wine, and genuine human connections.
investmentSection: Beyond personal enjoyment, this property presents compelling investment credentials. San Javier's real estate market is appreciating at 8% year-on-year, outpacing many Costa Blanca locations as savvy investors recognize the area's value proposition. Holiday rental demand is robust, with similar 3-bedroom properties commanding €800 per week during peak season—translating to potential annual rental income of €35,000-40,000 with proper management. The property's premium specification and pueblo location appeal to quality-conscious holiday renters seeking authentic Spanish experiences. At €2,976 per square meter, you're acquiring at a 35% premium to the local average of €2,200/m², justified by superior finishes and condition. Compared to Spanish island markets where similar properties exceed €5,000/m², this represents exceptional value. Whether held for personal use with seasonal rental income, or actively managed as an investment, this bungalow offers financial performance alongside lifestyle benefits.
conclusion: This San Javier bungalow represents a rare convergence of opportunity: an affordable entry point into Mediterranean property ownership, a proven holiday rental asset, and a genuine lifestyle upgrade for those seeking authentic Spanish living without premium pricing. The combination of premium finishes, strong appreciation fundamentals, and sustainable rental income makes this investment compelling for holiday home buyers. San Javier's established infrastructure, English-speaking community, and authentic pueblo character ensure this isn't merely a transaction—it's the beginning of countless Mediterranean memories. healthcare.text: Healthcare in San Javier is reliable and accessible, crucial reassurance for property owners and visitors. English-speaking doctors are readily available through private clinics in the immediate area, eliminating language barriers common in some Spanish regions. A regional hospital is positioned within 30 minutes, offering comprehensive emergency and specialist services. The quality of healthcare infrastructure reflects Murcia's broader commitment to modern medical standards. Many property owners arrange pre-arrival consultations with English-speaking practitioners, ensuring continuity of care. For retirees and families, this healthcare accessibility ranks among San Javier's most valued benefits.

The region has invested substantially in education infrastructure, recognizing demand from international residents. Spanish public schools are also available for immersion learning. Parents consistently report positive experiences with school integration and the bilingual opportunities available.

faqs.question: Hur mycket kostar denna fastighet?
faqs.answer: €258,900. This represents exceptional value for a 3-bedroom bungalow with premium finishes, priced 40% below comparable Spanish island markets. Flexible payment arrangements are available for qualified international buyers.

faqs.question: Kan utlänningar köpa fastighet i Spanien?
faqs.answer: Yes, absolutely. Non-Spanish EU and non-EU citizens can purchase property in Spain without residency requirements, though some nationalities may need an NIE (Spanish tax identification number). The process is straightforward with proper legal representation, which we recommend for all international purchases.

faqs.question: Är Costa Blanca en bra plats att köpa fastighet?
faqs.answer: Costa Blanca ranks among Spain's most attractive property markets for international buyers due to consistent appreciation, established expat communities, reliable climate, and diverse lifestyle options. San Javier specifically offers authentic living with strong fundamentals, appreciating at 8% year-on-year.

faqs.question: Vilka är kostnaderna för att köpa fastighet i Spanien?
faqs.answer: Beyond the purchase price, expect additional costs: property transfer tax (6-10%), notary fees (€600-1,500), registry fees (€200-400), and legal representation (€800-2,000). These typically total 8-12% of purchase price. Annual property tax and community fees apply thereafter.

faqs.question: Hur är levnadskostnaderna på Costa Blanca?
faqs.answer: Cost of living in San Javier and surrounding areas is notably lower than Northern Europe or Spain's major cities. Groceries, dining, and entertainment are affordable through local markets and established resident networks. Monthly living costs for comfortable lifestyle typically range €1,200-1,800 depending on personal choices.

faqs.question: Hur är vädret på Costa Blanca?
faqs.answer: Costa Blanca enjoys Mediterranean climate with over 300 days annual sunshine, warm temperatures averaging 17°C in winter and 28°C in summer. Rainfall concentrates in autumn and spring. This consistency makes it ideal for year-round holiday home usage and outdoor living.

faqs.question: Kan jag få ett bolån i Spanien som utlänning?
faqs.answer: Yes, many Spanish and international banks offer mortgages to foreign property buyers, typically requiring 30-40% deposit and proof of income. Interest rates are competitive. Professional mortgage brokers familiar with international clients can navigate options efficiently.

faqs.question: Är Costa Blanca bra för pensionärer?
faqs.answer: Costa Blanca is exceptionally popular with retirees due to excellent healthcare, low cost of living, established English-speaking communities, and year-round sunshine. San Javier specifically balances modern conveniences with authentic Spanish living, appealing strongly to mature buyers.

faqs.question: Vilken hyresintäkt kan jag förvänta mig från denna fastighet?
faqs.answer: Similar 3-bedroom properties in San Javier command approximately €800 per week during peak holiday season. Annual rental income typically ranges €35,000-40,000 with professional management. Off-season rates are lower but steady demand exists for shoulder seasons.

faqs.question: Hur långt är det från Sverige till Costa Blanca?
faqs.answer: Alicante-Elche Airport, 45 minutes from San Javier, offers numerous direct flights to UK airports (London, Manchester, Birmingham, Glasgow). Flight times are approximately 2.5 hours. This accessibility makes weekend visits and seasonal usage highly practical for UK-based buyers.
